title: In the Barn
description: The temptations of the flesh prove too much for devoutly Amish Sarah, and to make matters worse, the devil has come in the form of her own adopted brother, Eli. When she discovers him doing something strangely exciting in the barn, Sarah can’t help letting her hair down, in more ways than one, and together the siblings give rise to a new definition of sin.Selena Kitt SingleShort Story—Big Bang!(approx 2,500 words) This title contains shameless displays of pseudo-incest between stepsiblings so sinfully-hot it could send them to hell for eternity—but it would be worth it!
author: Selena Kitt
